summary: Ajay Kumar the newly appointed, honest SSP of Lucknow police cracks down on the nefarious cop-mafia nexus in Uttar Pradesh, but finds a cunning and ruthless adversary in Gajraj.
cast: Arshad Warsi|Pankaj Kapur|Mahima Chaudhry|Sushant Singh|Naved Aslam|Suhasini Mulay|Rajendra Gupta|Ujjwal Chopra|Ghanshyam Garg|Ravi Jhankal|Pratima Kazmi|Kali Prasad Mukherjee|Surendra Pal|Vikram Sahu|Rajendra Sethi|Vishnu Sharma|Jeetpal|Siddhartha Tewatia|Kuldeep Sareen|Suresh Dubey|Vivek Rawat|Rakesh Tripathi|Vishal Saini|Anup Pandit|Anup Karan|Abhijit Lahiri|Ahmed Khan|Abhay Bhargava|Padam Singh|Amit Bhalla|Madan Joshi|S. Modi|Surendra Rajan|Sunny Charles|Satyendra Tyagi|Sheetal Shah|Ashok Pandey|Srivas Naidu|Gautam Saugat|Punit Johari|Anup Upadhyay
title: Sehar
